text: Thomas Caers (born 14 January 1973) is a former Belgian footballer and currently manager. He was the manager of Sint-Truidense VV from February 2006 to November 2006, when he resigned. Caers played for MVV in the Dutch Eerste Divisie and K.A.A. Gent and K. Sint-Truidense V.V. in the Belgian First Division. ==Career as a player== *1977–1990 KFC Tongerlo *1990–1997 KVC Westerlo *1997–1999 KAA Gent *1999-02/2002 MVV *02/2002-10/2004 Sint-Truidense VV ==Career as a manager== *02/2006-11/2006 Sint-Truidense VV ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian football managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Thomas Caers
